definition: prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

pinyin: pian1 san1 lun2 mo2 tuo1 che1

sentences.english: It turns out Jialing is one of the oldest and largest motorcycle manufacturers in its home country.
sentences.chinese: 嘉陵是中國最古老也是最大的摩托車生產商之一。

sentences.english: Then, several motorcycle march off, leaving the engine sound.
sentences.chinese: 接着，幾臺摩托車揚長而去，留下陣陣的引擎聲。

sentences.english: Introduce:Nylon tyre cord fabric, motorcycles, napkin machine, bearings.
sentences.chinese: 輪胎永簾子布，摩托車，柔巾機，軸承。

sentences.english: This Paper analysed the characteristic of alnico adhesion of motorcycle starting motor, introduced the adhesive technique and the selecting of adhesives.
sentences.chinese: 分析了摩托車起動電機磁鋼粘接的特點。

sentences.english: What about motorcycle V. S. car oils ???
sentences.chinese: 摩托車和汽車機油對比怎麼樣？

sentences.english: Along the thoroughfare, motorcycles and smart new cars zoom past them.
sentences.chinese: 在大路上，摩托車和漂亮的新汽車迅速超過它們。

sentences.english: They are gorgeously captivating and comparable to that of legendary cruisers, and customized choppers.
sentences.chinese: 他們華麗的迷人和相若的傳奇巡洋艦和定製的摩托車。
四衝程汽油在摩托車發動機。

sentences.english: When I stop with motorbikes , it would appeal to me to go four wheels for many years.
sentences.chinese: 當我停止摩托車，它將呼籲我去四個輪子多年。

sentences.english: Aaron jumped a 15ft wide ravine on his motorcycle.
sentences.chinese: 他騎着摩托車跳躍一個15英尺寬的峽谷。

sentences.english: The failure of motorists to detect and recognize motorcycles in traffic is the predominating cause of motorcycle accidents.
sentences.chinese: 駕駛員的錯誤判斷是造成摩托車事故的主要因素。

sentences.english: Motorbikes and trucks hurtle along the roads.
sentences.chinese: 摩托車和卡車在村路上轟鳴而過。

sentences.english: He came here and rode his motorcycle to the county fair.
sentences.chinese: 他來到這兒，騎着他的摩托車去鄉村集市。

sentences.english: Police on motorbikes tried to ride the criminal down.
sentences.chinese: 騎着摩托車的警察試圖追上罪犯。

sentences.english: A scooter not used for three months at a time can easily have dry rot on the tire.
sentences.chinese: 一名摩托車不習慣在三個月時間就可以輕易幹腐輪胎。

sentences.english: Dale and Becky are negotiating the price with Bo, the man who rents Jet Skis.
sentences.chinese: 戴爾和貝齊正跟海邊租水上摩托車的阿寶議價。

definition: locomotive/train engine car/scooter (Tw)/(slang) (Tw) hard to get along with/a pain in the ass/damn!/crap!
to travel along a route (of vehicles etc)
car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
